name: Crap!
description:
Collect Different Cards!

Different Cards do Different Things! 

Throw At Enemies! 

Avoid Flying Dice!

Don't Die!

--------------------------------------------- 
Creators:
Lucas Cowper(Designer/3D Modeler)
Curtis Hagan(Designer/Programmer)
Dillan Myers(Sprite Artist/Music Producer)

--------------------------------------------- 
How to Play:
> WASD to move
> Use Mouse to Aim
> Left Click to shoot

A GMTK Game Jam game
